design_system.theme_strategy: Soft Utility (Productivity Focus) with Dark/Light Toggle

headings.usage: Use for all H1-H6. Tracking tight (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for paragraphs, inputs, and data tables. Relaxed line-height.

monospace.usage: Use for code snippets, API keys, or technical data.

palette_rules: Never use pure black (#000000). Use Slate 900 (#0F172A) instead.
Primary color is for Actions only (Buttons, Links).
Use 'Surface Highlight' for hover states on cards/rows.

spacing.philosophy: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/70 dark:bg-slate-900/70 border border-white/20 shadow-sm
visual_enhancers.neumorphism_card: bg-surface border border-border shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200
visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle mesh gradients for hero backgrounds, never for text.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:opacity-90 rounded-full px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-surface border border-border text-text-primary hover:bg-surface-highlight rounded-full px-6 py-2.5 font-medium
buttons.ghost: text-text-secondary hover:text-primary hover:bg-primary/10 rounded-md px-4 py-2

cards.task_card: bg-surface border-l-4 border-l-primary border-y border-r border-border rounded-r-lg p-4 hover:translate-x-1 transition-transform
cards.note_card: bg-surface border border-border rounded-xl p-6 hover:shadow-lg transition-shadow flex flex-col gap-2
cards.post_card: bg-surface border-b border-border p-6 first:rounded-t-xl last:rounded-b-xl last:border-b-0

inputs.style: bg-surface border border-border rounded-lg px-4 py-2 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary outline-none transition-all

landing_page.hero_section: Split layout: Left text (H1 + CTA), Right 3D Abstract Image. Background: Subtle mesh gradient.
landing_page.features_section: Bento Grid: Mix of large (col-span-2) and small (col-span-1) cards showing 'Tasks', 'Notes', 'Posts' features.

dashboard.structure: Sidebar (Fixed Left) + Topbar (Search/Profile) + Main Content Area.
dashboard.responsive: Sidebar becomes Bottom Nav or Hamburger Menu on Mobile.

images.description: Abstract 3D dark shapes for Hero section background or visual anchor.
Minimalist workspace for 'Organize your life' feature section.
Abstract spheres for 'Creative Freedom' or 'Notes' feature.

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons (Home, Settings, Edit, Trash, Plus, etc.).

guidelines: Use asymmetric layouts, avoid generic centered designs.
Add hover:scale-105 or hover:bg-accent to all interactive elements.
Use the glassmorphism class for the Topbar and Modals.
Generous spacing - use p-6 or p-8 for cards.
Ensure text contrast - use Slate-400 for placeholders, Slate-900/50 for text.
Use data-testid on buttons, inputs, and cards.
No default gray backgrounds - use the tinted Slate colors.
